column5: Relax in this cozy private room with a queen bed, private bathroom, and coffee station. In the morning, enjoy a breakfast of muffins, toast, oatmeal, and various cereals in our sunny kitchen. Our home is in a quiet suburban neighborhood just 8 minutes from historic Gruene, 11 minutes from downtown New Braunfels nightlife, and 13 minutes from the Schlitterbahn waterpark. We look forward to welcoming you!
column8: Relaxing retreat w/ breakfast, 4 miles from Gruene
